Load in necessary packages and set the seed.

```{r}
set.seed(123)
library(igraph)
```

```{r}
graph <- sample_gnp(20, 0.2, directed = T)
V(graph)$size <- 5
E(graph)$arrow.size <- 0.5

fr_layout_gr <- layout_with_fr(graph)
random_layout_gr <- layout_randomly(graph)

plot(graph, l = fr_layout_gr, vertex.label = NA, main = "Network displayed using FR algorithm")
plot(graph, l = random_layout_gr, vertex.label = NA, main = "Network displayed randomly")
```

```{r}
fr_graph <- sample_smallworld(1, 50, 2, 0.1)

V(fr_graph)$size <- degree(fr_graph) * 2
E(fr_graph)$arrow.size <- 0.5

fr_layout_fr <- layout_with_fr(fr_graph)
random_layout_fr <- layout_randomly(fr_graph)

plot(fr_graph, l = fr_layout_fr, vertex.label = NA, main = "Network displayed using FR algorithm")
plot(fr_graph, l = random_layout_fr, vertex.label = NA, main = "Network displayed randomly")
```
